function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of pandemic on real estate sector in Turkey","Impact":"Reduction in investments in space renovations, crisis in real estate values for commercial space","Mitigation":"Implementing support measures for entrepreneurs, providing tax credits and financial support","Technologies":"Financial tools, tax policy adjustments","People":"Entrepreneurs with leased properties","Owner":"Government, policy makers"},{"Description":"Effects of social distancing on tourism, retail, and manufacturing sectors","Impact":"Contracted operating regimes, reduced investments in space renovations, crisis in real estate values for the commercial space market segment","Mitigation":"Gradual reopening, expansion of take-away services, easing mobility constraints","Technologies":"Digital solutions for remote operations, online sales platforms","People":"Business operators, entrepreneurs","Owner":"Government, business associations"},{"Description":"Limited support measures for entrepreneurs with leased properties","Impact":"Financial strain on entrepreneurs with leased properties, vulnerability to bad loans","Mitigation":"Enhanced financial support, comprehensive coverage of commercial contracts","Technologies":"Financial management tools, loan restructuring mechanisms","People":"Entrepreneurs with leased properties","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"}]}
